name: Phylocommons
tagline: A Django interface to an RDF Treestore. Using RDF to enable community annotation and reuse of phylogenies.
body:
### PhyloCommons

PhyloCommons is a web application designed to simplify the sharing, annotation, querying, and reuse of phylogenetic trees.

The web application frontend to PhyloCommons is currently in development. The RDF treestore behind PhyloCommons can be accessed at https://github.com/bendmorris/rdf-treestore


### Acknowledgements
This project has been developed as part of Phylotastic, a series of recent hackathons organized by the Hackathons, Interoperability, Phylogenies (HIP) Working Group at the National Evolutionary Synthesis Center (NESCent). http://www.evoio.org/wiki/HIP
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
